gnat.filter
Interface Filter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbbreviationFilter, AliBabaSpeciesNer, AlignmentFilter, DefaultSpeciesRecognitionFilter, DisambiguationFilter, DummyFilter, GeneNerFilter, GeneRepositoryLoader, GnatServiceNer, GOFilter, IdentifyAllFilter, ImmediateContextFilter, LeftRightContextFilter, LinneausSpeciesServiceNer, MultiSpeciesDisambiguationFilter, NameRangeExpander, NameValidationFilter, RecognizedEntityUnifier, RunAdditionalFilters, RunDictionaries, RunGoDictionary, SimpleSpeciesDisambiguation, SpeciesPostProcessing, SpeciesValidationFilter, StopWordFilter, StrictFPFilter, TfIdfFilter, TfIdfFilterTest, UnambiguousMatchFilter, UnspecificNameFilter
public interface Filter

Interface for all filters that handle contexts, text repositories, and gene repositories.

Author:
Joerg

Method Summary
 void filter(Context context, TextRepository textRepository, GeneRepository geneRepository)
          The minimum filtering method that has to be implemented.
 

Method Detail

filter

void filter(Context context,
            TextRepository textRepository,
            GeneRepository geneRepository)
The minimum filtering method that has to be implemented. A Run will call this method for each filter in sequence.
Each filter can read and potentially change context, textRepository, and geneRepository in this method.

Parameters:
context -
textRepository -
geneRepository -
